about_the_game: This package contains a set of 4k visual assets for GWENT: The Witcher Card Game. Please note that it is designed specifically with 4k displays in mind, and will not enhance graphical quality in lower resolutions.
detailed_description: This package contains a set of 4k visual assets for GWENT: The Witcher Card Game. Please note that it is designed specifically with 4k displays in mind, and will not enhance graphical quality in lower resolutions.
legal_notice: CD PROJEKT®, The Witcher®, GWENT® are registered trademarks of CD PROJEKT Capital Group. GWENT game © CD PROJEKT S.A. All rights reserved. Developed by CD PROJEKT S.A. The GWENT game is set in the universe created by Andrzej Sapkowski in his series of books. All other copyrights and trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
name: GWENT: The Witcher Card Game - 4k graphic assets pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 | AMD A4-7300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 | Radeon R7 240
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
